page.title: 18ASHLEY WOOD GOLF COURSE
page.content: WE VISITED ASHLEY WOOD GOLF COURSE ON THE 4TH.OF JULY TO TALK TO{MR ROGERS,} THE CLUB SECRETARY. HE TOLD US THAT THE COURSE WAS MADE IN 1936 BY{ROY}&{JACKIE CAREY.}THE COURSE IS 5692 M.LONG & THE LONGEST HOLE IS 495 M. THERE ARE 450 MEMBERS. THE CLUB OFFICIALS ARE-{NIGEL STAINER -HEAD GREENKEEPER,{JAMES ALLEN-}DEPUTY {MR.H.WHITE,}CHAIRMAN OF THE GREENS COMM.THER IS NO CURRENT PRESIDENT. AGES FOR JOINING -JUNIORS 10-18,COLTS 18-21 & MEMBERS OVER 21. THE HOURS ARE FROM 7.30 TO DARK AND THE CLUB IS OPEN EVERY DAY EXCEPT CHRISTMAS DAY. { MR.ROGERS}VERY KINDLY GAVE US SOME LEMONADE.IT WAS A VERY HOT DAY. {TOBY,KAREN,JASON,KIRSTIE.
